Description: Away swing, low bounce, beats the outside edge. Landed around fourth on a length and finished farther, Rohit crouches and reaches out with an open-faced bat. Close call but gets away with it
Pulled behind square. Old-school Rohit, standing upright, waiting for the shortish ball to reach hip-height and helping it for a flat six.
Touch too straight, clipped off the pads. Through square leg
Length on fourth, extra bounce. Good leave
A bit of away movement, that was late swing. Landed around fifth and kept going away. Left alone
Wide and full, swing away but it's outside the tramline. Let go
Overpitched on fourth, 135ks, swing away. Driven softly, off the middle, to cover
Three-quarter length on fifth, Gill happy to take a decent front stride and punch it firmly to cover
Fullish on fifth, 135ks, defended towards cover
Tickles a leg glance this time, it's edgy. Half-volleys the keeper, wide enough to his left to ensure Latham can only parry it a few feet to his side. Was a full ball around leg
Zips off the pitch but that's gone down leg. Fullish length ball delivered from slightly wide of the crease, landed around leg, swung after passing the batter as he tried to glance it

Flicked aerially but in the gap to the left of midwicket. 137ks, looked like the inswinger, picked off a fullish length off middle stump. Rohit playing it from the front of the body after standing still for most of the ball's path
Full on off, flicked along the ground this time. Through the gap at midwicket again, stopped in the outfield
Length on middle and off, 137ks, flicked to short midwicket. O'Rourke bowling to the field there. This one's come onto bat nicely
Spanked through cover, swing of the bat finishes behind shoulder. Was a good ball actually, on a length in the channel, Rohit holding onto a solid base and nailing it through the line

Almost-leave steer to deep third. Gill's bat was behind him, pointing towards the slip almost. The three-quarter-length ball went off the face of the bat, in the gap. Looked like he was in control though
Wide-ish length ball let go

Away movement and low bounce beats the pull. Looked like a length ball, maybe slightly back, and Rohit shaped for the pull early. He committed to fetching from outside off but the seam movement took it well away

Rohit takes a chance, it's an ugly miss but the ball goes over middle. Jamieson, and Phillips, have hands on heads. Pre-meditated shot, he danced down and made room to slog it over long-on. The 130ks length ball rose off the pitch and was wider than the bat swing. Rohit was nowhere near but gets away with it.
Fullish on leg, clipped to the left of deep fine leg. 138ks
Length at the stumps, worked back to the bowler
Length on off, clipped to short midwicket off the back foot
Soft hands guide the ball behind point. Off a thickish outside edge but Gill ensured he played it close to the body. Was a length ball in the channel
Length on middle and off, 137ks, Gill slides across a touch and closes the flick to midwicket. Played without much weight transfer
Down leg. Four wides so far this innings. This was fullish and got decent bounce
Gill's arms swivel in a flash as he dances down and pulls to the left of deep fine leg. Ravindra charges and tumbles to stop it. Great shot though, 143ks shortish ball, yet Gill forced it with muscle
Length in the channel, vertical-bat punch is firm and goes to cover
Lbw appeal but that appeared to be going down leg. Fullish length ball at 137ks landed around off, might've swung in late. Gill's head fell over as he tried to hit it through midwicket
Seam-up. Length on middle, defensive flick takes it towards square leg
Punches the full ball on fourth, 135ks, to mid-off.

Beaten on the aerial flick, Rohit wanted to go square, maybe even behind. There is deep square leg, 68 metres away. He saw the fullish ball angle in, lifted the back leg and tried to elevate it. Missed it completely
Flicks the length ball off the pad through square leg
Fullish on fifth, 130ks, might've swung back in a touch. Let go
Bad ball, gets away with it. Very wide on a length, 129ks, sat up perfectly for the cut that Gill nailed. Found cover point
Fullish on fifth, defended to point
Length at the stumps, worked back to the bowler

Rohit breaks free this time, that's a massive six over cow corner. Crowd love it. Pre-meditated. He danced down to a 137ks length ball, had a baseball swing across the hip. All horizontal, the ball sailed 92 metres far.
Smith follows him as he makes room this time. 136ks on a length, Rohit has to check his shot, jabs it into the off side of the pitch
Length over top of middle, clipped through square leg
Length on off, 132ks, clipped to deep square leg, who moves to his diagonal right to stop it
Length on leg, defended to the bowler's right

Mitchell puts down a one-hander at midwicket. India missed a few half-chances, NZ have lost one. He leapt to his right, tried to take it just over head-height, his dive was stunted by the fact that he was too near to the ball. The hands extended, his left leg was up but the right leg and hand were flailing to the right, and the ball burst through. Graphic shows he was 24 metres far. Gill came down the track and tried to whip it. Off the bottom of the bat it came
Length on off, defended to cover
Rohit pulls it over midwicket. One-bounce four. Length ball, top-of-stump height at best. Rohit lifted it with a bat swing going from low to high. Got it flat too
Beaten on the flashing square drive. Back of a length, in the channel, might've bounced more than Rohit expected
Length in the channel, open-faced slice takes it to the left of Phillips at backward point. He swoops and slides it keep it to one
Pitched up, punchy drive takes it to mid-on

And it reaches crescendo as the ball clears the straight boundary. Fifty up for India. He stood slightly leg side of the ball, the front foot strode out late, the bat whooshed through the line. The straight drive got a lot of height on it, felt for a second like it was too high, but no, it sailed 83 metres far. Peak height was 25 metres
On the pads, looks to flick it. Off the pads it goes into grass

Brilliant lap sweep lifted over short fine leg! Rohit's back foot was in front of middle, front foot outside off, the torso went across, the head was in line with the ball, Rohit drove the bat through and got it off the middle
Driven off a length while standing upright. Takes the length ball in the channel to cover
Slapped over point, NZ's pacers getting carted. This was wide, not too short but that didn't matter. Rohit stood in the crease and belted it after the ball came in line with him
Length on fourth, square driven late. Finds point. Santner gave it air, got good bounce. No spin though
Length on fourth, jabbed with a horizontal bat to cover
Good ball. On a length, off-stump line, 91ks. Gill looks to defend to the bowler's left, thick outside edge takes it towards point
Length on leg, clipped to midwicket
Full on off, defended to cover
Fullish on middle, defended back to the bowler. 92ks. Think Rohit could've danced down the pitch and pumped it over the bowler's head, but he's not taking chances against Santner
A bit of turn away. 85ks, fullish length, landed around fourth and Gill drove it to cover. Ball hovered low and went to him on the bounce
Quick single to midwiclet. Length on middle and leg, flicked off the back foot. 94ks
Full on leg, 93ks, pushed back to the bowler
Full at the stumps, loopy, driven to long-off
Champan saves three at point. He was on the edge of the ring, moved to the left and dove to catch the ball after the passed him. Was a shortish ball outside off that was cut
Length on fourth, punched to long-off

That is a top half-century for Rohit. A captain's knock just when it was needed the most.Gets there off just 41 balls and it's made India's chase very easy. He reaches there by driving Santner to deep cover
Angled in fuller on off, he punches to the left of Santner who does well to his left
Angles this slower on off stump as he strides forward and defends
Pushed quicker at 90.1kph on off, he defends back towards the bowler
Flatter at 87kph around off, he pushes to cover
Big turn for Santner.Hangs the length ball on off and gets it to turn away late past Gill's outside edge
Flatter and stifle short on middle stump, he pushes to long-on for a run
Floated outside off, he slices towards point
Short and wide, he cuts this to deep point
Arm ball that slides back into Rohit who just gets his bat down in time and defends towards cover
Edged, but he gets four.Tossed up outside off, turning away from Rohit, who drives on the up, gets a thick outside edge and with no slip there, it was always flying away
Was there an edge? Don't think so.Short and wide at 98kph outside off. He shapes up for the cut and gets beaten
Drops his length and gets punished. Was outside off as Gill hops back and pulls to the left of deep midwicket
Shortens his length outside off, he stays back and pushes past point for a run
Angles the length ball on leg stump, he works this behind square for a run
Flatter on leg stump, he works this to midwicket
Tossed up on off stump, Gill drives handsomely past extra cover for a run
Angles the length ball on middle, Rohit gets forward and defends
Tossed up fuller on off at 87kph. Gill drives to long-off for a run
Gives him a bit of width as he stays back and slashes this past point for a couple of runs
Floated outside off stump, Rohit stays leg side of the ball and pushes to Rachin
Angled in flatter on middle and leg, he defends to the on-side
Stifle short on middle and leg, he stays back and punches to long-on for a run
UP AND OVER!Charges down the track, gets under the ball and launches Ravindra over long-on. There was a fielder in place but Gill did not care. Made that look so easy there, did Gill
Fuller on middle stump, he digs this to extra cover
Marginally short but Rohit is so quick in picking lengths. Hops back in an instant and pulls in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
Hangs this at 78kph on off as he slashes this past point for a run
Tossed up on off, he drives to long-off with ease
Flatter at 92kph outside off, he prods forward and drives to deep cover
Angled in on a length on leg stump, he works this to midwicket.
Floated just around off stump, he flicks this aerially but wide of short midwicket for a run down to long-on
Pushed quicker on off stump, he defends back to the bowler
Angles the length ball on middle and leg, he clips this to short midwicket
Dragged down outside off stump, he shovels this to deep square leg
Shortish in length again on leg stump, he hops back and pulls to deep square leg's left for a run
Fuller on middle stump, he drives firmly to wide long-off
Hint of turn away from Gill outside off. He pushes to cover with an angled bat
On the bounce to long-off. Was angled in on the stumps, he chips this to the fielder. Think he was in control, there
Angles the length ball around off stump, Rohit gets forward and defends
Arm ball at 91.6kph on off. Rohit brings his bat down in time and pushes back towards the bowler
Floated on leg stump rather just outside as Rohit gets outside the line and eases to long-on
Darts the length ball on the stumps, he gets across and punches back to the bowler, who misfields and concedes a run.The 100 is up as well for India in 17 overs.
Flatter length ball just outside off, he chops this down to point
Fired in on middle and leg, he works this behind square for a run
Gently floated on off stump at 85.5kph as Rohit pushes to long-off for a run
Much quicker at 92kph on off stump, he bunts this to the left of Rachin who makes a sprawling dive and intercepts
Floated outside off, he charges down and slams this down the ground. O'Rourke hares across to his left and saves three
Tossed up outside off, he opens the face of the bat a touch and guides to point. That will be drinks with India cruising.
Stifle short on off stump, he stays back and pulls to the right of deep backward square leg for a couple of runs
Hint of turn on middle, he prods half-forward and blocks
Tossed up on off, he drives firmly to GP at extra cover

Has anyone seen Superman and Phillips in the same room? I doubt it.He has just caught another blinder. And this one really is an absolute blinder. Floated outside off, he looks to go up and over GP at short extra cover. That was a boundary if anyone else was there. Not when GP is there. He leaps, flicks out his right hand and hangs on to a stunner. Flashes a big smile right after.
Tossed up on middle and leg, he works this past square leg to get off the mark
Tossed up outside off, he shoulders arms

He's rapped on the pad first ball and the umpire is given it out.Oh, wow, that's a big decision. Will Kohli review?He has to, almost and he does.Tossed up outside off turning back into Kohli who misses the flick and is caught in front. That looks plumb on first viewing. What does the tracker say?Struck in line - yes. Going onto hit the stumps - Oh, yes!Bracewell is pumped up and NZ suddenly have an opening

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Slower good length ball on off, he works this to short midwicket

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: On a length outside off, he eases to long-on

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,no run
Description: Tossed up on off, worked to square leg

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,1 run
Description: Floated just outside off, he eases to long-on

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Tossed up length ball turning into middle and leg, he ticks this to square leg
Length on fourth, punched while on the back foot to cover
Full on middle and leg, 81ks, defended to the bowler. More a round-arm ball
Full on middle and leg, flicked to long-on. Pace very slow
Shreyas needs no sighters, the ball sat up off a length and he twirl-pulled way over midwicket. No one in the deep. Back foot was in the crease, the front foot slid back too
Darter this time by Santner, on a length and angled towards top of leg. Beats him on the flick
Full around off, defended to point, who's close in

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,no run
Description: Length on fourth, worked off the back foot to midwicket

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,1 run
Description: Another flick beaten, pad hit, but height might've been the issue here. Given runs, is it? Was a length ball that drifted away to land in line with fifth and finished around top of off after beating the inside edge

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full around off, worked back to the bowler

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Fullish on off, Shreyas goes back and works it to the leg side

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: Tight single to point's left. Shreyas the caller there, Rohit was a touch hesitant but charged through. Was a full ball around off that was defended

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,no run
Description: Fullish on off, flicked to the leg side.
Shreyas' weight is on the front foot and that yorks him. He manages to punch the ball back to the bowler
Full outside off, 88ks, punched to sweeper cover
Full on middle, 89ks, punched to long-off
Full on middle and leg, backs away and drives to cover
Full on leg, worked back to the bowler
Full on middle and leg, clipped through midwicket. 98ks

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,1 run
Description: Rohit dances down, turns the length ball into a full one and flicks it to long-on. 84ks

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: Length down leg, Shreyas is moving about in the crease a lot. He finishes square on and reaches down leg for the flick, gets it to deep square leg

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,no run
Description: Length on leg, beats the flick and hits top of pad. Ball goes where short leg woulda been

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,2 runs
Description: Gentle lap sweep. Rohit got into position early and had to delay his shot a bit but got the full ball on the stumps real fine. Stopped in the deep

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,no run
Description: Works it off the front foot to mid-on

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Rohit Sharma,no run
Description: Driven off the bottom of the bat, skewed wide to the left of the bowler. He leaps low but can't get hands on the hovering ball. It goes to mid-off
Goes back and punches it to long-off
Punched off the back foot to the bowler
Length on off, 95ks, Rohit slides his front leg to the leg side and drives to the bowler

Ooh, Rohit was in trouble there. Lbw and caught midwicket were in play. He tried to sweep the full ball well in front of the body, was too early on it. The bottom hand might've come off but the ball went into the
Full around fourth, defended to the bowler's left. 93ks
Fullish length ball on the pads, clipped to midwicket

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Taken? No, it doesn't carry back to the bowler. Bracewell reached and fell forward but got half-volleyed. Was a length ball that landed around off and spun in sharply. Shreyas was going square on seamlessly but realised midway into the shot that he didn't account for the turn or the slowness. Got a leading edge that lobbed, but luckily for him the lack of power worked for him in the end

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full at the stumps, worked back to the bowler

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Driven off the back foot to mid-off

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full on fourth, defended to cover. 91ks

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full on fourth, 89ks, worked to midwicket

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full on fourth, worked to the bowler's right

The Squeeze. IS. ON! In fact, NZ have squeezed water out of stone. Rohit dances down and gets stumped! Huge moment, he waslks back with his head down for most of the way back. Applause from the crowd but NZ are well in the game now. First ball of the over, Rohit looked to manufacture a boundary. Was a shortish ball outside off that spun away, was a pre-meditated shot from Rohit. He charged down and tried to slap it over cover
Sharp spin in, from a shortish length, punched off the back foot to midwicket
Full outside off, driven to cover
Full outside off, driven to cover
Shortish ball bounces extra and beats the cut and hits him on the thigh pad
Goes back and punches the length ball on off to mid-off

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full on fifth, defended to point. 88ks.

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Dances down, gets to the pitch and works it back to the bowler

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,SIX runs
Description: Young tries to take a blinder, has to throw the ball back though. Has he stepped on the cushion though? Yes, replays show. He moved to the right, was facing right too and tried to take it above head. took it with both hands but one of the feet landed too quickly. Was a length ball to which Shreyas danced down and flicked with a full follow-through

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Length down leg, flicked off the back foot with the spin

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full on fifth, 90ks, punched to cover

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Full on fifth, 89ks, defended to point
Full around off, worked to long-on

Bad misfield at short third by O'Rourke, Run-out chance? Axar was three-fourth of the way down but the throw never comes. Young twisted his ankle as he turned which let Shreyas off the hook. Was a length ball outside off that Shreyas tried driving through cover.
Length at the stumps, worked to midwicket. 90ks
Shovel pulls a length ball down leg to deep fine leg. Might've been a touch late on it
Length on fourth, driven from the crease to cover
Phillips boling to Axar like Axar bowled to him earlier in the evening. 89ks, flat on leg stump, punched to long-on

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,no run
Description: Single stopped with a dive to the right at mid-on.

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,no run
Description: Full on middle, defended to the bowler

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,1 run
Description: Goes back and punches it to long-on. Length on middle and off, Axar moved leg side and got the front leg in the air which made even more room

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: Full down leg, 88ks, glanced to short fine leg

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,no run
Description: Fullish on leg, defended to the bowler's left. 88ks.

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,1 run
Description: Full on off, 82ks, driven to long-off
Wide and fullish, slapped to long-off.
Full on off, 91ks, worked to long-on
Fullish on middle, looked quick off the pitch. 93ks. Axar tried to drive straight, inside edged it through square leg
Length on fifth, square driven off the back foot to deep point
Full on middle, 87ks, flicked to midwicket
Wide on a length, slapped to long-off. Risk-free five runs off the over

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,1 run
Description: Fullish outside off, pushed to long-off

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Fullish at the stumps, defended to cover

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,no run
Description: Length ball lands around off and spins down leg, glanced with the turn to short fine leg. 86ks

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,2 runs
Description: Two dots and Shreyas charges down to whip hm over midwicket. The bat-face turned inwards on impact but there was enough elevation to eliminate the risk of a wicket. Floated a touch, Shreyas got to the pitch and was in position, got it off the bottom of the bat

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: Goes back and whips it to deep midwicket

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,no run
Description: Wide and slow on a fullish length, underedged cut goes to point
Fullish outside off, pushes it with an open bat-face to point
Goes back and drives the length ball to long-on
Loopy fullish ball outside off, stock ball. 86ks. Pushed through point
Length on fourth, pulled to wide long-on

Swatted just wide of square leg. Catchable height but well to the left of Chapman at square leg. He flung his body but the ball sped past him. Was a shortish ball that didn't rise much and Shreyas pulled it while crouching. Great hand speed. India 99 away now
Fullish on fifth, 91ks, open-faced push takes it to backward point

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: Length on middle, flicked to long leg. Aaron Finch, on air, says the pressure seems to be waning off India

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,1 run
Description: Fullish on fourth, driven through cover

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: Good single to the left of cover point. Tossed-up fullish ball at the stumps, Shreyas' body was lunging forward early but he took the power off the full-faced block. It opened up to allow the ball trickle off side

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,no run
Description: Drives the full ball back to the bowler. Stopped in the follow-through, lots of revs on that

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,1 run
Description: Cuts the length ball outside off to deep point

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Shreyas Iyer,1 run
Description: Shortish ball on fifth spins back, Shreyas is able to cut it nicely. Finds sweeper cover
Beaten on the cut. Loopy shortish offbreak landed wide outside off and spun in a touch. Not much bounce or pace to work with
Dances down but has to slice it as the ball was shortish. Gets it to short third
Length on off, punched to long-on off the back foot
Stop the press. Phillips misfields. Just a single allowed though. He moved to the left in follow-through and slid low. Was a length ball at the stumps that was punched with the full-faced bat
Tucks it off the back foot through midwicket
Shreyas wanted the single, Axar sends him back... like he did the second ball of the over. This was a length ball on fourth that was defended to the keeper's left
Good length ball angling into Axar on middle and leg, he mistimes to mid-on
Back of a length ball on middle stump, he stands tall and bunts to mid-on and sets off
Good length ball outside off, he carves it to deep point
On a length angling into Axar on middle. He whisks this to midwicket. Hit that fairly firmly but couldn't find the gap
Banged in short on middle, he splices to deep midwicket for a run
Banged in short as expected outside off stump, he swivels and pulls to the right of deep midwicket for a couple of runs to end the over
Flatter on middle and leg, he chips this aerially to long-on for a run
Goes flatter and drags his length on off, he pushes back to the bowler
WHACKED!Floated outside off stump. He bends down on one knee, gets under it and absolutely smokes this over deep midwicket for a 109m six. That is huge!

DROPPED by Jamieson at long-on!That is such a huge moment in the game. Floated on off, he charges down, gets too close to the ball and hits this straight to Jamieson who has dropped an absolute sitter
Flatter on middle and leg, worked to square leg for a run
Floats this on off stump, he prods forward and eases past Phillips down to long-on
Back of a length ball outside ff, he steers this down to deep third
Back of a length ball on middle and leg, he works this to deep backward square leg
Banged in short outside off, he looks to just help this fine, gets a soft top-edge to deep fine leg
Sharp good length ball on middle, he ticks this to midwicket
Pulled with disdain, and he gets a four for his effort. Stunning shot!Back of a length ball on the stumps, he whips it past mid-on with authority

Again, confusion with the running but Iyer is safe.Good length on off, he pushes to mid-off and takes a few steps down the track before going back. Iyer commits to the single only to turn back in time. There is a direct hit, but Iyer was in. That will be drinks
Angled in on off stump as Iyer prods forward and pushes to cover
Flatter on leg stump, he was looking to work this away but misses and is rapped on the pad
Floated outside off, he drives to extra cover

In the air and taken by Ravindra sprinting to his left from short fine leg.That is a lovely catch by him diving low. Stifle short on middle stump, he gets across looking to pull this fine, gets it off the splice. Rachin moves beautifully to his left and grabs this inches off the turf
Floated outside off, he stretches forward and drives to deep cover
SMOKED for six!Tossed  up on the stumps, he brings out the slog sweep and nails that over deep backward square leg
Flatter on off stump, he stays back and pushes to the bowler
Tossed up outside off, he shimmies down the track and ticks to midwicket
Turns the length ball into Rahul who stays back and pushes to cover
Flatter length ball around off stump, he stays back and pushes this to straight midwicket
A yes and no situation and they make it home, eventually Tossed up on off, he works this to Santner's left at square leg. Miscommunication but here was always a run on

Summary: Michael Bracewell to Axar Patel,no run
Description: Slower length ball on middle, he works this to midwicket
Flatter length ball on middle stump, he plays with an open face of the bat to GP's left at extra cover and takes a quick run
Flattish length ball on off, he stays back and works this to midwicket
Drags down his length outside off as Axar stays back and punches to long-off
Going, going, gone!Gently tossed up on leg stump. Rahul clears his front leg, gives himself some room and goes miles over long-on
Short and wide outside off, he stays back and slaps to the right of GP at short extra cover. He gets a hand to it, but can't prevent two. India's 200 is up
Angled in on middle, he works this with soft hands towards deep midwicket for a run
Tossed up on off, he works this calmly to square leg
Tossed up on middle stump, he clips this past GP at short midwicket for a run

Axar falls and Bracewell has another one.That's not Axar's best moment, I must add. Floated on off stump, he takes a couple of steps down the track and looks to go over long-off. Completely mis-hits this and O'Rourke takes a safe catch.
Flatter length ball on off, Pandya prods forward and defends
Darted in on off stump, Pandya stretches forward and defends
Slows up the length ball outside off, he gets half-forward and blocks
Angles the length ball on middle, he prods forward and defends back to the bowler
Floated outside off, he plays with an open face of the blade to cover point's right. Rahul wanted the run, Pandya didn't
Tossed up on middle, he stays leg side of the ball and eases it to long-off
Tad bit short on leg stump, he works this to the on-side for a quick run
Good length ball outside off, he pushes to the right of cover point. He wanted a run but is sent back again
Flatter and well down leg. Called a wide
Angles the full-length ball on the stumps which is batted back to the bowler. Santner finishes with 2 for 46 off his ten
Tossed up on leg stump, he pushes to long-on for a run
Floated outside off, he opens the face of the bat and steers to point
Short and wide, he drills this to deep cover but only for a run
Whacked for a couple of runs. Dragged down again outside off, he clatters this through covers and to the right of sweeper
Short, wide one more time. He cuts this hard to sweeper cover. Not the best over from Rachin so far

Tossed up on middle, he ticks this to deep midwicket with soft hands where GP comes charging in and prevents the second. He fails to pick up cleanly and had the two committed to the second run, they would have been home easy
Four to start the 45th over. Too full outside off, Rahul stays still and drills the cover drive away from the fielder deep.
Good length ball outside off, he pats this to the left of point and they get two more
Good length ball again outside off as Rahul steers this to the right of Chapman at point for a run again
back of a length ball on Pandya's hips around middle and leg. He gets across and tips this to midwicket
Too short outside off stump, Pandya lets this go. Think he was looking for a wide, not given.
Length ball on his pads, Pandya flicks this with authority but there is a fielder stationed at deep midwicket
CRRRRUNCHED!Tossed up right in his arc on middle. He extends his arms and sends this sailing straight over the bowler's head for a huge six
Flatter outside off, he drills this to extra cover
Flatter outside off, he chops this onto the pitch with the ball going to point. They take a quick run
Quicker length ball outside off, he mistimes this back towards the bowler
Shimmies down the track and eases the length ball to long-on for a run
Floated outside off, he pushes to extra cover for a run. 11 off the over.
Tossed up outside off, Pandya lets the ball go and that's been called a wide. Ooh, think that's a tight call. Latham missed and conceded a bye as well
Banged in short, he mistimes his pull to deep backward square leg for a run
Swish and a miss!Back of a length ball skidding through at pace on off. He was looking to pull that away, but gets beaten
BANG! Good length ball outside off, he jumps down the track and muscles it over mid-off. The ball goes to the fence one bounce
Fuller in length outside off, he drives to deep cover
Big miscommunication, but no harm done.Good length ball on leg stump, he works this fine to Rachin who fires in a throw. Both Rahul and Pandya are almost at the same end. Eventually, no harm done.
Banged in short at shoulder height, he pulls to deep square leg for a run
Back of a length ball on off, he mistimes towards the off side, they take a quick run
Sharp short of a length ball outside off, he sways outside the line of that

Straight up and taken by Jamieson. Is it not over yet?Sharp bouncer shoulder-high on off. Pandya is rushed into the pull and can only manage a top-edge that goes straight up and is held by Jamieson with ease
Back of a length ball on his hips, he works this to deep backward square leg and takes a couple of runs
Two more! India getting closer. Banged in short on middle, he hooks to deep backward square leg
Back of a length ball outside off, he chops this to point and sets off for a run only to be sent back. Chapman underarms a direct throw but Jadeja is in
Yorker on off stump, he squirts this past a diving point for a couple of runs
Good length ball on off, he gets a thick inside-edge to the on-side for a run
Good length ball on leg stump, the ball flicks his pad through to the keeper
Fuller in length on off, he pushes to mid-off and sets off
Banged in short, he nails the pull to deep square leg on the bounce

INDIA WIN THE CHAMPIONS TROPHY!A third title for them in the competition. And this surely has to be the most comprehensive. Unbeaten all through the tournament and have rarely been challenged at any stage. It is Ravindra Jadeja, who hits the winning runs. Pulls this past deep square leg and into the fence. Raises his arms in delight, so does Rahul as the rest of the team rushes out to the middle.A second straight ICC title for India.
